meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: LEAD: New Plea for Ozone Shield The head of the Environmental Protection Agency called for complete elimination of chemicals thought to destroy the ozone layer. Page A20. A Refund From Kodak Kodak gained court approval to disburse nearly $200 million to an estimated 3.4 million people who bought its instant-picture cameras.

LEAD: New Plea for Ozone Shield The head of the Environmental Protection Agency called for complete elimination of chemicals thought to destroy the ozone layer. Page A20. A Refund From Kodak Kodak gained court approval to disburse nearly $200 million to an estimated 3.4 million people who bought its instant-picture cameras.

New Plea for Ozone Shield The head of the Environmental Protection Agency called for complete elimination of chemicals thought to destroy the ozone layer. Page A20. A Refund From Kodak Kodak gained court approval to disburse nearly $200 million to an estimated 3.4 million people who bought its instant-picture cameras. Page D5. Hard-Liner Gets Polish Post Poland's Communist leadership picked Mieczyslaw Rakowski, the party's propaganda chief, as the new Prime Minister. Page A3. Anti-Drug Lessons All public schools in New York City will be required by the end of December to provide some form of education about drug abuse. Page B1.
